promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary crustacean water-type pokemon with dark carapace. It can be found in river-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or crustacean. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Rivashell, a a chibi young legendary crustacean water-type pokemon. It can be found in river-like environments It has the following abilities: Max Whiteout. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "crustacean", "water" or "Rivashell". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, crustacean-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: Known as a gentle river guardian, Rivashell uses its Max Whiteout ability to create icy shields. Its chibi form is a deceiver, for it holds ancient power.
